description.value: The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.

Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, [[/r {2d6}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}, and 2 acid splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 2d8 fire damage, [[/r {2}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}, and 2 fire splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.
This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

Activate A Interact

This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. For the next 5 minutes, your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover by 1.

Activate A Interact

Enzymatic compounds in this elixir strengthen and excite the muscles in your legs. You gain a +10 foot status bonus to your Speed for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate)]{Effect: Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate)}

This venom erodes its target's defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 21 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d10[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Activate A Interact

An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Antidote (Lesser)]{Effect: Antidote (Lesser)}

Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creatures natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r {3d6+6}[healing]]]{3d6+6 Hit Points} and gain +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Elixir of Life (Lesser)]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Lesser)}

[[/r {2d6+2}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}

4 Acid Splash Damage

4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}

4 Fire Splash Damage

An Aspis technician carries the following infused items: 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Antidote (Lesser)]{Lesser Antidotes}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Moderate)]{Moderate Acid Flasks}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)]{Moderate Alchemist's Fires}, and 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Elixir of Life (Lesser)]{Lesser Elixirs of Life}.

These items last for 24 hours or until the next time the technician makes their daily preparations.

Requirements The Aspis technician is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand

Effect The Aspis technician applies a poison to the weapon.
The Aspis technician Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

The Aspis technician deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]
